certifications.title: Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
The Ultimate MySQL Bootcamp: Go from SQL Beginner to Expert

projects.name: Image Classification using CNN
projects.description: Built and fine-tuned a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for image classification, enhancing precision, reducing training time and demonstrated strong skills in model design and training. Constructed a CNN for image classification, reaching high accuracy and notably decreasing image misclassification through advanced optimization techniques.

projects.name: Color Detection in BGR
projects.description: Designed a color detection system using Python and OpenCV, effectively identifying and distinguishing various colors in HSV format also applied this in real-time scenarios. Crafted a real-time color recognition feature, enabling the camera to identify colors based on predefined HSV values and provide accurate color information when an image is captured.

projects.name: Python Voice Assistance
projects.description: Created a Python-based voice assistant capable of performing tasks such as setting alarms, searching the web, and sending emails. Boosted speech recognition accuracy and reduced response time through advanced natural language processing and machine learning techniques.

projects.name: Road Sign Detection using YOLOv8
projects.description: Utilized a pre-trained YOLOv8 model for road sign detection, fine-tuning it with a larger dataset to boost accuracy and enhance detection performance. Achieved better accuracy for detecting and classifying road signs by leveraging transfer learning and advanced data augmentation techniques.

experiences.description: As the Head of Logistics for the club, oversight was provided for all event logistics, employing advanced planning, efficient scheduling, and effective leadership.
